message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $110. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $130. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Hi Alice, $130 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $115.  Let's try to make this work.

Hi Bob, I understand you're willing to go up to $115, but I'm still not willing to sell it for that low. I'm willing to make one more offer to try to find a middle ground. I'll give you a deal at $125. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price for this amazing product.
